title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Terror: Division 162 and 99 Target Threats in Gaza”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

In close combat and aerial strikes: Forces from Division 162 eliminated many terrorists over the past 24 hours; Forces from Division 99 located a machine for producing rockets and eliminated terrorists.

As part of the operations of Division 162 in the Rafah area, the forces eliminated many terrorists in close combat and aerial strikes, destroying terrorist infrastructure in the region.

Forces from Division 99 located during operations in the center of the Gaza Strip machines for producing weaponry and a significant amount of terror funding. The fighters eliminated terrorists who posed a threat to the forces on the ground.

Last night (Thursday), several launches were identified from the Beit Hanoun area, landing in open spaces in the Lachish region with no casualties.
In closing the loop, the firepower of the Gaza Division, together with the Air Force aircraft, targeted terrorist sites in the area from which the launches were identified.

Attached are photos from the forces’ operations: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/anc1207202464856465

Attached is documentation from IDF strikes in the Gaza Strip: https://bit.ly/4608HkC
